mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mini_market_member_item_pic ( member_item_no, member_item_pic1, member_item_pic2, member_item_pic3, member_item_pic4, member_item_pic5, pic_date ) VALUES ( #{memberItemNo}, #{memberItemPic1}, #{memberItemPic2}, #{memberItemPic3}, #{memberItemPic4}, #{memberItemPic5}, NOW() )
